TrunkSid.description: The SID of the Trunk to associate the credential list with.

CredentialListSid.description: The SID of the [Credential List](https://www.twilio.com/docs/voice/sip/api/sip-credentiallist-resource) that you want to associate with the trunk. Once associated, we will authenticate access to the trunk against this list.

$ul: **account_sid**: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the CredentialList resource.
**date_created**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was created specified in [RFC 2822](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2822.txt) format.
**date_updated**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was last updated specified in [RFC 2822](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2822.txt) format.
**friendly_name**: The string that you assigned to describe the resource.
**sid**: The unique string that we created to identify the CredentialList resource.
**trunk_sid**: The SID of the Trunk the credential list in associated with.
**url**: The absolute URL of the resource.
